mapper.sql: id, name, coupon_value, coupon_validay, coupon_number, create_time, use_with_account, coupon_name, coupon_min_money, begin_time, end_time, is_activty, brand_id, distribution_mode_id ,recommend_delay_time,distance_birthday_day,real_time_coupon_begin_time,real_time_coupon_end_time,is_brand
mapper.insert: insert into tb_new_custom_coupon (id, name, coupon_value, coupon_validay, coupon_number, create_time, use_with_account, coupon_name, coupon_min_money, begin_time, end_time, is_activty, brand_id, distribution_mode_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couponValiday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useWithAccount,jdbcType=BIT}, #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponMinMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{isActivty,jdbcType=BIT}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionModeId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tb_new_custom_coupon
id, name, coupon_value, coupon_validay, coupon_number, create_time, use_with_account, coupon_name, coupon_min_money, begin_time, end_time, is_activty, brand_id, distribution_mode_id, time_cons_type, begin_date_time, end_date_time, coupon_type, shop_detail_id, is_brand, recommend_delay_time, distance_birthday_day, real_time_coupon_begin_time, real_time_coupon_end_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couponValiday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useWithAccount,jdbcType=BIT}, #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponMinMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{isActivty,jdbcType=BIT}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributionModeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeConsType}, #{beginDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{couponType}, #{shopDetailId}, #{isBrand}, #{recommendDelayTime}, #{distanceBirthdayDay}, #{realTimeCouponBeginTime}, #{realTimeCouponEndTime},
mapper.update: update tb_new_custom_coupon set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_value = #{couponValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon_validay = #{couponValiday,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_number = #{couponNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_with_account = #{useWithAccount,jdbcType=BIT}, coupon_name = #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_min_money = #{couponMinMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIME}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIME}, is_activty = #{isActivty,jdbcType=BIT}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, distribution_mode_id = #{distributionModeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, distance_birthday_day = #{distanceBirthdayDay} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id,name,coupon_value,coupon_validay,coupon_number,create_time,shop_detail_id,brand_id,is_brand, use_with_account,coupon_name,coupon_min_money,begin_time,end_time,is_activty,brand_id,distribution_mode_id,time_cons_type,begin_date_time,end_date_time,push_day ,recommend_delay_time,real_time_coupon_begin_time,real_time_coupon_end_time from tb_new_custom_coupon where brand_id=#{brandId} and coupon_type = #{couponType} and is_activty=1

select id,name,coupon_value,coupon_validay,coupon_number,create_time,coupon_type,shop_detail_id,is_brand, use_with_account,coupon_name,coupon_min_money,begin_time,end_time,is_activty,brand_id,distribution_mode_id,time_cons_type,begin_date_time,end_date_time, recommend_delay_time,distance_birthday_day,DATE_FORMAT(real_time_coupon_begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') realTimeCouponBeginTimeString, DATE_FORMAT(real_time_coupon_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') realTimeCouponEndTimeString from tb_new_custom_coupon where (brand_id=#{brandId} and is_brand = 1 ) or ( is_brand = 0 and shop_detail_id = #{shopId} )

select id,name,coupon_value,coupon_validay,coupon_number,create_time,coupon_type, use_with_account,coupon_name,coupon_min_money,begin_time,end_time,is_activty,brand_id,distribution_mode_id,time_cons_type,begin_date_time,end_date_time, recommend_delay_time from tb_new_custom_coupon where brand_id=#{brandId} and coupon_type = #{couponType} and is_activty=1

select id,name,coupon_value,coupon_validay,coupon_number,create_time,coupon_type, use_with_account,coupon_name,coupon_min_money,begin_time,end_time,is_activty,brand_id,distribution_mode_id,time_cons_type,begin_date_time,end_date_time, recommend_delay_time from tb_new_custom_coupon where shop_detail_id=#{shopId} and coupon_type = #{couponType} and is_activty=1 and is_brand=0

select id,name,coupon_value,coupon_validay,coupon_number,create_time, use_with_account,coupon_name,coupon_min_money,shop_detali_id,begin_time,end_time,is_activty,brand_id,distribution_mode_id,time_cons_type,begin_date_time,end_date_time from tb_new_custom_coupon where shop_detail_id=#{shopId} and coupon_type = #{couponType} and is_activty=1

select id,name,coupon_value,coupon_validay,coupon_number,create_time,coupon_type, use_with_account,coupon_name,coupon_min_money,begin_time,end_time,is_activty,brand_id,distribution_mode_id,time_cons_type,begin_date_time,end_date_time, recommend_delay_time from tb_new_custom_coupon where brand_id=#{brandId} and coupon_type = #{couponType} and is_activty=1 and is_brand=1
